release.name: Play it, Sam. Play "As Time Goes By"

intro.p: This is the 0.8.0 release of the GStreamer Python bindings. It should be used with the 0.8.x series of GStreamer and GStreamer Plug-ins.
This is the first stable 0.8.0 gst-python release, it's now considered stable and ready to be used in production. It's already being used by serveral applications.
